Title: Directs the secretary of state to prepare and distribute to cities, towns and villages a model comprehensive outdoor lighting ordinance
Summary: Directs the secretary of state to prepare and distribute to cities, towns and villages a model comprehensive outdoor lighting ordinance.
LawCode: Add ยง137, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the preparation and distribution of a model comprehensive outdoor lighting ordinance
